item.title: What is sturctured light 3d technology OUT
item.description: What is Structured Light 3D Scanning Technology? # Structured light 3D scanning technology is a popular method for capturing high-resolution 3D models of physical objects. It is a non-contact method that involves projecting a pattern of light onto an object and capturing the deformation of the pattern as it reflects back onto a camera. This process creates a depth map of the object’s surface which can be used to reconstruct a digital 3D model.
